meanings.definition: Caponize: to castrate a rooster for the purpose of fattening it for meat.
meanings.sent1: The farmer decided to caponize the rooster to prepare it for a special meal.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often caponize roosters to make their meat more tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chef caponize the rooster? To make a delicious dish, of course!
meanings.sent4: The act of caponizing the rooster turned it into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The process of caponize made the rooster perfect for the dinner table.
